you guys have anything you wanna meet to chat about?

Otherwise I’m gonna ping Kiln and Republic, and keep working on the rewards distribution. Yesterday i got it working across multiple files, which was rather tricky because at the file boundaries the  reward coupon redemption “update” shows up in the next file. Anyway, got it working.

I tried to run it overnight on my laptop, but it took too long and bailed out. Have to run it in lambda, so i’m setting that up now on lambda
